author: Wzyss
install_msg: Thank you for installing FixupX Nudge! Use `[p]help fixupxnudge` to see available commands.
name: FixupXNudge
short: Gently nudge users to use fixupx.com for X/Twitter post links.
description: Monitors messages for X/Twitter post links and suggests users use fixupx.com for better embed support. Only nudges for post links (containing /status/), not profile links.
